name: Link v.2
description:
Replaces the post link button with a picture of Link from the Legend of Zelda.
Inspired by http://userstyles.org/users/135160 and the gif posted on http://m4ster-shortpants.tumblr.com/
(I just wanted one that wasn't a gif so I made this)
additional_info:
If you experience problems you can contact me at ifyouarereadingthis.info@gmail.com

Update 3/29: Fixed such minuscule details that no one will even notice. But I made it so I noticed and it bothered me.

Update 4/16: Tumblr messed with their settings and it messed this up bad. That's fixed now.

Update 3/05/13: Double image problem fixed. Image sharpened and straightened.
